MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Kingsknowe Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to a fault on our underground cable network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:35am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:57am on the 22nd of January 2021.
